description:
A regional law firm of 150+ attorneys is seeking an experienced Calendaring/Docketing Clerk for their Cerritos office. This position will be working with a team of clerks to manage all firm litigation deadlines in CompuLaw, the firm's calendar/docketing system.

Duties:

  • Calculate and track all state, federal, appellate and OAH deadlines.
  • Review all incoming and outgoing mail, emails and e-filings to ensure deadlines are entered into the system.
  • Create regular reports to ensure accurate data and distribute as needed.

Qualifications:

  • Over 2 years of experience of litigation calendaring experience.
  • Proficiency in a docketing software, preferably CompuLaw.
  • Ability to work onsite daily in Cerritos.
  • Ability to work overtime when needed to meet the department's needs.

The compensation range for this position is $60,000-$75,000. Additional benefits include health benefits (medical, dental, and vision), Health Savings Account, Flexible Spending Account, Dependent Care, 401(k) match, profit sharing plan, and 16 vacation/sick days to start.

If you are a qualified calendaring clerk interested in hearing more about this opportunity, please apply today!

Equal opportunity employer. Minorities / Women / Veterans / Disabled are strongly encouraged to apply!

Pay Details: $60,000.00 to $75,000.00 per year

Search managed by: Christina Lee

Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled

To read our Candidate Privacy Information Statement, which explains how we will use your information, please navigate to https://www.lhh.com/us/en/candidate-privacy

The Company will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records subject to federal contractor requirements and/or security clearance requirements.
